Package com.sanyavertolet.interview.parser.tokenizer

Class SimpleTokenizer

java.lang.Object
com.sanyavertolet.interview.parser.tokenizer.SimpleTokenizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Tokenizer
public class SimpleTokenizer extends Object implements Tokenizer
A simple implementation of the Tokenizer interface, responsible for breaking down an input string into a list of Token objects. The SimpleTokenizer supports basic expression parsing, including operators, numbers, references, and strings.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    SimpleTokenizer()
    Constructs a SimpleTokenizer with an initial position and empty expression.

  • Method Details

    • tokenize

      public List<Token> tokenize(String input) throws ExpressionParsingException
      Tokenizes the given input string into a list of Token objects.
      Specified by:
      tokenize in interface Tokenizer
      Parameters:
      input - the input string to be tokenized.
      Returns:
      a list of tokens representing the parsed elements of the input string.
      Throws:
      ExpressionParsingException - if an error occurs during tokenization, such as invalid syntax.
